priceHistory.source: Chapman Hall Realty on the Square

attributeSource.infoString2: Chapman Hall Realty on the Square

data.description: Introducing a charming 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home in the serene Garden Gate community - where traditional aesthetics meet modern upgrades. As you step through the front door, the 2-story foyer warmly invites you in, showcasing tasteful wainscoting that beautifully frames an open flex space. This versatile space can be molded into a formal living area, dining room, or both, offering endless possibilities. The home effortlessly unfolds with its impressive upgrades including luxury vinyl plank flooring, Recess lighting in every room, refreshed carpeting, wainscoting & built in speaker system in the living room. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with butcher block and quartz countertops, complemented by a modern backsplash and stainless-steel appliances. Enjoy casual meals in the cozy kitchenette that grants a picturesque view of the expansive family room, with the bespoke accent wall and wood-burning fireplace as its centerpiece. Venture upstairs to find three comfortably sized bedrooms. The master ensuite emerges as a sanctuary, featuring a double vanity and separate shower and tub, ensuring daily pampering. The exterior is just as enchanting. Relax on the extended patio and cherish moments of peace in a fenced backyard, perfect for both solitude and gatherings. Located in the heart of it all, this home is a short drive from the trendy Buford Exchange shops and the bustling Scenic Highway boutiques. With swift access to the highway, daily commutes become a breeze. Whether you're a first-time homebuyer or an astute investor, this home embodies value, style, and convenience. Don't miss this opportunity. Book your private tour today!
